name: Adventure Boy Cheapskate DX
description: Swap-quest adventure game, with puzzles, secrets, and humorous dialogue. A huge cast of funny, weird and thoughtful characters await, as you guide Benson, the wise-cracking teen through a journey to reclaim his stolen bike.This is the definitive version of Adventure Boy Cheapskate with new puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Any
